SourceAnalyzer.Name: Naming Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Rules which enforce naming requirements for members, types, and variables.

CollectionProperty.Name: Hungarian
CollectionProperty.Description: The list of allowed prefixes for variable and field names.

Rule.Name: ElementMustBeginWithUpperCaseLetter
Rule.Context: {0} names begin with an upper-case letter: {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that names of certain types of elements begin with an upper-case letter.

Rule.Name: ElementMustBeginWithLowerCaseLetter
Rule.Context: {0} names must start with a lower-case letter: {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that names of certain types of elements begin with a lower-case letter.

Rule.Name: InterfaceNamesMustBeginWithI
Rule.Context: Interface names must start with the capital letter 'I': {0}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of an interface begins with the capital letter 'I'.

Rule.Name: ConstFieldNamesMustBeginWithUpperCaseLetter
Rule.Context: Constants must start with an upper-case letter: {0}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a constant begins with an upper-case letter.

Rule.Name: NonPrivateReadonlyFieldsMustBeginWithUpperCaseLetter
Rule.Context: Readonly variables that are not declared private must start with an upper-case letter: {0}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a non-private readonly field begins with an upper-case letter.

Rule.Name: FieldNamesMustNotUseHungarianNotation
Rule.Context: The variable name '{0}' begins with a prefix that looks like Hungarian notation. Remove the prefix or add it to the list of allowed prefixes.
Rule.Description: Validates that a variable name is not prepended with lower-case characters matching the signature of Hungarian notation.

Rule.Name: FieldNamesMustBeginWithLowerCaseLetter
Rule.Context: Variable names and private field names must start with a lower-case letter: {0}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a variable or field begins with a lower-case letter.

Rule.Name: AccessibleFieldsMustBeginWithUpperCaseLetter
Rule.Context: Public and internal fields must start with an upper-case letter: {0}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a public or internal field must begin with an upper-case letter.

Rule.Name: VariableNamesMustNotBePrefixed
Rule.Context: Variable names must not start with 'm_' or 's_'.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a member variable does not begin with the 'm_' or '_s' syntax.

Rule.Name: FieldNamesMustNotBeginWithUnderscore
Rule.Context: Field names must not start with an underscore.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a field does not begin with an underscore.

Rule.Name: FieldNamesMustNotContainUnderscore
Rule.Context: Field names must not contain underscores.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a field does not contain underscores.

Rule.Name: StaticReadonlyFieldsMustBeginWithUpperCaseLetter
Rule.Context: Static readonly fields must start with an upper-case letter: {0}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a static readonly field begins with an upper-case letter.
